SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.services

Class TokenService

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.services.TokenService
public class TokenService extends Object
Service class for handling activation token generation and management.

This stateless EJB provides functionality for creating secure activation tokens used for user account verification processes.

  • Method Details

    • createNewActivationToken

      public String createNewActivationToken(TemporaryUserDTO newUser)
      Creates and persists a new activation token for a temporary user.

      This method:

      1. Finds the temporary user by email
      2. Generates a secure random token
      3. Sets creation timestamp
      4. Associates the token with the user
      5. Persists the token
      Parameters:
      newUser - The DTO containing temporary user information
      Returns:
      The generated token value as a Base64-encoded string
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs during persistence
      IllegalArgumentException - If the temporary user cannot be found
      See Also:
      • TemporaryUserDTO
      • ActivationTokenEntity

    • createNewPasswordResetToken

      public String createNewPasswordResetToken(String email)
      Creates and persists a new password reset token for a user by email. Deletes any existing tokens for the user before creating a new one.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user
      Returns:
      The generated password reset token value, or null if user not found

    • renewToken

      public String renewToken(Object user, Object token)
      Renews an existing token by deleting the old one and generating a new activation token.

      Currently supports activation tokens, with future extensions planned for password reset tokens.

      Parameters:
      user - The user associated with the token renewal.
      token - The token to be renewed.
      Returns:
      A new activation token if renewal is successful, null otherwise.

    • getTemporaryUserFromActivationToken

      public TemporaryUserDTO getTemporaryUserFromActivationToken(ActivationTokenDTO activationTokenDTO)
      Retrieves the temporary user associated with a given activation token.
      Parameters:
      activationTokenDTO - The activation token data transfer object.
      Returns:
      The corresponding TemporaryUserDTO if found, null otherwise.

    • getActivationTokenByValue

      public ActivationTokenDTO getActivationTokenByValue(ActivationTokenDTO activationTokenDTO)
      Retrieves an activation token entity based on the provided activation token value.
      Parameters:
      activationTokenDTO - The activation token data transfer object.
      Returns:
      A corresponding ActivationTokenDTO if found, null otherwise.

    • getPasswordResetTokenByValue

      public PasswordResetTokenDTO getPasswordResetTokenByValue(PasswordResetTokenDTO passwordResetTokenDTO)
      Retrieves a password reset token entity by its value and maps to a DTO.
      Parameters:
      passwordResetTokenDTO - The DTO containing the token value
      Returns:
      The mapped PasswordResetTokenDTO, or null if not found

    • isTokenExpired

      public boolean isTokenExpired(Object token)
      Checks whether a given token has expired.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the token is expired, false otherwise.

    • getExpirationDate

      private LocalDateTime getExpirationDate(Object token)
      Determines the expiration date of a given token based on the latest system configuration.
      Parameters:
      token - The token for which the expiration date is being determined.
      Returns:
      The expiration LocalDateTime, or null if unable to determine.

    • activationTokenEntityToActivationTokenDTO

      private ActivationTokenDTO activationTokenEntityToActivationTokenDTO(ActivationTokenEntity activationTokenEntity)
      Converts an ActivationTokenEntity to an ActivationTokenDTO.
      Parameters:
      activationTokenEntity - The activation token entity.
      Returns:
      A data transfer object representation of the activation token.

    • passwordResetTokenEntityToPasswordResetTokenDTO

      private PasswordResetTokenDTO passwordResetTokenEntityToPasswordResetTokenDTO(PasswordResetTokenEntity passwordResetTokenEntity)

    • generateNewToken

      public String generateNewToken()
      Generates a new secure random token.

      Creates a cryptographically strong random token using:

      • SecureRandom for random number generation
      • 24 bytes of random data
      • Base64 URL-safe encoding
      Returns:
      A URL-safe Base64-encoded random token string
